edu.brown.cs.cdluo.stars

Class KDTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.brown.cs.cdluo.stars.KDTree

  • public class KDTree
extends Object
    The KDTree class, which contains most of the logic of the program. It builds the tree and can run knn and radius searches on the tree.
    Author:
    cdluo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KDTree(Star[] stars)
      The constructor which builds the tree.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Checks for equality.

      .
      ArrayList<KDNode> getTree()
      Returns the tree.
      int hashCode()
      Returns a hashcode of this class.
      int incDimen(int curDimen)
      Returns the current dimension +1, unless it would be the max dimension, in which case it returns 0 to revert back to checking the first index of a Dimen object.
      DistQueue knn(KDNode curr, int curDimen)
      A recursive knn search, which stores the nearest neighbors in the global distqueue (dq).

      This prep method instantiates the resources needed for knn.

      Sorts a stars array by a dimension.
      ArrayList<DQEntry> sortRadius(ArrayList<DQEntry> rad)
      Sorts the radius arraylist in ascending order for printing.
      String toString()
      For the tree's toString method, I just printed the size of the tree, since printing and organizing the entire tree is difficult to do in a clean way.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KDTree

        public KDTree(Star[] stars)
        The constructor which builds the tree.
        Parameters:
        stars - an array of stars to build the tree with.

    • Method Detail

      • buildTree

        public KDNode buildTree(Star[] stars,
                        int curDimen)
        Recursively builds the KDTree using the stars array provided.
        Parameters:
        stars - the provided stars
        curDimen - the current dimen we are building on/depth of the tree.
        Returns:
        the root of the tree (at the top call).

      • sortByDimen

        public void sortByDimen(Star[] stars,
                        int cDimen)
        Sorts a stars array by a dimension.
        Parameters:
        stars - the array to be sorted.
        cDimen - the dimen we're sorting on.

      • addRoot

        public void addRoot(Star s)
        Used to add the root into the tree.
        Parameters:
        s - the Star to become the root.

      • incDimen

        public int incDimen(int curDimen)
        Returns the current dimension +1, unless it would be the max dimension, in which case it returns 0 to revert back to checking the first index of a Dimen object.
        Parameters:
        curDimen - an int representing a dimension that a method is checking on
        Returns:
        an int representing the next dimension.

      • prepknn

        public void prepknn(int k,
                    Dimen point,
                    boolean nameArg)
        This prep method instantiates the resources needed for knn. By making these resources global, I don't have to pass them all as arguments with each recursive call of knn.
        Parameters:
        k - the number of neighbors to find
        point - the point we're looking for neighbors around
        nameArg - whether the user input a name or not instead of a coordinate.

      • knn

        public DistQueue knn(KDNode curr,
                     int curDimen)
        A recursive knn search, which stores the nearest neighbors in the global distqueue (dq).
        Parameters:
        curr - the current Node we're on/ the next one to search in calls.
        curDimen - the dimension we're sorting/searching on.
        Returns:
        A distqueue holding the nearest neighbors.

      • prepRadius

        public void prepRadius(double r,
                       Dimen point2)
        Prepares the radius search similarly to prepknn.
        Parameters:
        r - the radius to search in.
        point2 - the point to search around.

      • radius

        public ArrayList<DQEntry> radius(KDNode curr,
                                 int curDimen)
        Recursive radius search. It's almost the same as knn, but with some minor changes noted in the comments.
        Parameters:
        curr - As with knn the current/next node.
        curDimen - ^
        Returns:
        An ArrayList holding the Entries which hold the stars in the radius.

      • sortRadius

        public ArrayList<DQEntry> sortRadius(ArrayList<DQEntry> rad)
        Sorts the radius arraylist in ascending order for printing.
        Parameters:
        rad - the list to be sorted
        Returns:
        the sorted list.

        . Gets the root of the tree

        public ArrayList<KDNode> getTree()
        Returns the tree.
        Returns:
        the tree.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        For the tree's toString method, I just printed the size of the tree, since printing and organizing the entire tree is difficult to do in a clean way.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        a string of the size of the tree.
